product.longDescription: Our monogerm cilantro is faster to germinate than whole-seed cilantro varieties by 1 day, and more readily sheds its seed coat. Both are important time savings when growing for micros. Intricate green leaves, cilantro flavor. Also available in organic seed. Avg. 70,600 seeds/lb.
product.shortDescription: Improved microgreen production over standard cilantro.

Cilantro, Monogerm Microgreen Seed

Product ID:3446M.263446M

Our monogerm cilantro is faster to germinate than whole-seed cilantro varieties by 1 day, and more readily sheds its seed coat. Both are important time savings when growing for micros. Intricate green leaves, cilantro flavor. Also available in organic seed. Avg. 70,600 seeds/lb.
